argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmf.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | nmf.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 3 |  | nminv.i | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_grpidcl | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( 0g ` G ) e. X ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( 0g ` G ) e. X ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` G ) = ( -g ` G ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` G ) = ( dist ` G ) |
| 11 | 2, 1, 9, 10 | #P_ngpdsr | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ ( 0g ` G ) e. X ) -> ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) = ( N ` ( ( 0g ` G ) ( -g ` G ) A ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) = ( N ` ( ( 0g ` G ) ( -g ` G ) A ) ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 1, 6, 10 | #P_nmval | |- ( A e. X -> ( N ` A ) = ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 9, 3, 6 | #P_grpinvval2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( I ` A ) = ( ( 0g ` G ) ( -g ` G ) A ) ) |
| 16 | 4, 15 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( I ` A ) = ( ( 0g ` G ) ( -g ` G ) A ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( I ` A ) ) = ( N ` ( ( 0g ` G ) ( -g ` G ) A ) ) ) |
| 18 | 12, 14, 17 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( I ` A ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
